entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Trenton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:01 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -5.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 03:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -5.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -11.4°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries or rain showers beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
